detectors.description: Lotto.calculateWinner(uint256,uint256) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#48-81) uses a weak PRNG: "winningTicketIndex = decisionBlockHash % rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#63-64)"
Lotto.fallback() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#148-175) ignores return value by msg.sender.send(msg.value - value) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#157)
Lotto.cash(uint256,uint256) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#102-124) ignores return value by winner.send(subpot) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#120)

Deprecated standard detected uint256(block.blockhash(blockIndex)) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#127):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Lotto.fallback() (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#148-175):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.send(msg.value - value) (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#157)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#162)
	- buyersLength = rounds[roundIndex].buyers.length ++ (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#165)
	- rounds[roundIndex].buyers[buyersLength] = msg.sender (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#166)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCountByBuyer[msg.sender] += ticketsCount (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#169)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#170)
	- rounds[roundIndex].pot += value (samples/ds/tier2/contracts/ds_t2_081.sol#173)
